sentences.english: Thousands of people streamed past the now moribund check points.
sentences.chinese: 數千德國人湧到行將就木的檢查站。

sentences.english: The government of Ernesto Zedillo knew that the food subsidy programs would do little to help.
sentences.chinese: 薩迪略政府知道之前的食物補貼制度已經行將就木。

sentences.english: Is the old faithful axe on its last leg?
sentences.chinese: 你那柄忠實的舊斧頭已經行將就木了麼？
